metadata.Title: CVE-2023-0341 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A stack buffer overflow exists in the ec_glob function of editorconfig-core-c before v0.12.6 which allowed an attacker to arbitrarily write to the stack and possibly allows remote code execution. editorconfig-core-c v0.12.6 resolved this vulnerability by bound checking all write operations over the p_pcre buffer.

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Mark Esler and David Fernandez Gonzalez

criterions.comment: editorconfig-core: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
